speaker.whotheyare: Jim Hagemann Snabe is the chairman of the world’s largest container transportation company, A.P. Møller - Mærsk, and of industrial giant Siemens. He is also a member of the board of trustees at the World Economic Forum.
speaker.whylisten: After spending 25 years in the software industry, Jim Hagemann Snabe has dedicated his leadership to the reinvention of large global companies like Siemens and A. P. Møller Mærsk to become more digital and sustainable and deliver value to all stakeholders. His leadership approach seeks to inspire people to dream big and unleashing their potential to innovate solutions for a sustainable future.
